findings.title: ChainExtension Implementation Lacks Weight Charging
findings.description: The current implementation of the ChainExtension trait fails to charge weight when allowing smart contracts to call into the runtime.

findings.title: Vector of unlimited size in the pallet
findings.description: The orml-currencies-allowance-extension pallet employs the usage of the Vec data structure without incorporating any size checks, which can result in node overload due to the necessity of iterating through the entire vector, leading to potential memory exhaustion and creating a vulnerability for denial-of-service (DoS) attacks.

findings.title: Employment of Sudo Pallet
findings.description: The current implementation of the sudo FRAME pallet in the runtime employs it as an alternative to the governance mechanism.

findings.title: Error Handling in Chain Extension
findings.description: Implementation of `ChainExtension` often utilizes `DispatchError::Other("Explanatory string")` error, which makes error handling difficult.

findings.title: Hardcoded Constants in `match`
findings.description: The presence of hardcoded constants in the `match` statement within the implementation of `ChainExtension` hampers code readability.

findings.title: Linter Warnings
findings.description: The implementation contains linter warnings identified by `cargo clippy`, including needless return and borrow, which can impede code readability and maintenance.

findings.title: Logging in Runtime
findings.description: The implementation of `ChainExtension` contains unnecessary `warn!()` macros which clutter the codebase and can impede code readability and maintenance.

findings.title: Pendulum build
findings.description: The Pendulum chain demonstrates a smooth and error-free build process.

findings.title: Superfluous Implementation of Hooks Trait
findings.description: The `Hooks` trait is used to perform logic on every block initialization, finalization, and other specific actions. However, in the case of the `orml-currencies-allowance-extension` pallet, no methods from the `Hooks` trait are implemented, which can reduce code readability and increase complexity.

findings.title: Test Coverage
findings.description: Low test coverage of 22.22% in orml-currencies-allowance-extension pallet and lack of testing for ChainExtension implementation in foucoco runtime.

findings.title: Vulnerable and Unmaintained Dependencies
findings.description: The `orml-currencies-allowance-extension` pallet has several dependencies that raise concerns regarding their security and maintenance.
